titleStmt.title: To the honourable the knights, citizens and burgesses, in the Commons House of Parliament now assembled The humble petition of 15000. poore labouring men, known by the name of porters, and the lowest members of the citie of London.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by R. Oulton and G. Dexter, for John Bull,

notesStmt.note: Identified as Wing P1856A on UMI microfilm set "Early English books, 1641-1700".
Reproductions of the originals in the British Library (Thomason Tracts) and the University of Illinois Library (Early English books).
